root.name: Karnaaj Rally
root.description: Worst Cover Art of All Time? Karnaaj Rally is a decent arcade racing game, but it is perhaps most well known for it's horrendous cover art. It was featured in a 1up.com feature entitled "Hey Covers... You Suck!" and also in an infamous review by Electronic Gaming Monthly contributor Seanbaby in which the writer refused to actually play the game after seeing the unpleasant image on it's cover.
